The parody tweet mixed together two stor: one about the US giving Iran taxpayer dollars and another about Russia purchasing uranium.
U: S. Attorney General William Barr does not use a personal Twitter account, and the account claiming to be him had a giveaway sign of a misspelled name.
The 2015 agreement with Iran: known as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action, did not involve American tax dollars being given to Iran for the purchase of uranium from Russia. The deal instead involved the freeing up of frozen Iranian assets and the lifting of economic sanctions.
